status.name: status
status.description: View VRChat status dashboard with metrics visualization

report.name: report
report.option_details: Additional details about the issue (max 500 chars)

dashboard.title: VRChat Status Dashboard
dashboard.error_description: Failed to generate dashboard. Please try again later.

guild_disabled.title: VRCPulse - Unregistered
guild_disabled.description:
This server was unregistered %{time}.
Run `/config setup #channel` to re-enable alerts.

guild_intro.title: Welcome to VRCPulse!
guild_intro.description: VRCPulse monitors VRChat server status and alerts you when issues occur.
guild_intro.field_getting_started_value:
1. Run `/config setup #channel` to register this server
2. Check current VRChat status with `/status`
guild_intro.field_commands_value:
- `/config setup <channel>` - Register and set alert channel
- `/config show` - View current settings
- `/config unregister` - Disable alerts
guild_intro.footer: This server isn't registered yet. Run /config setup #channel to get started!

user_disabled.title: VRCPulse - Unregistered
user_disabled.description:
You unregistered %{time}.
Run `/config setup` to re-enable DM alerts.

user_intro.title: Welcome to VRCPulse!
user_intro.description: VRCPulse monitors VRChat server status and alerts you when issues occur.
user_intro.field_getting_started_value:
1. Run `/config setup` to register for DM alerts
2. Check current VRChat status with `/status`
user_intro.field_commands_value:
- `/config setup` - Register for DM alerts
- `/config show` - View current settings
- `/config unregister` - Disable alerts
user_intro.footer: You aren't registered yet. Run /config setup to get started!

confirm.title: Confirm Unregister
confirm.description_guild:
Are you sure you want to unregister **%{name}**?

This will stop all VRCPulse alerts for this server.
confirm.description_user:
Are you sure you want to unregister?

This will stop all VRCPulse DM alerts.

success.title: Unregistered
success.description:
VRCPulse alerts have been disabled.

You can re-register anytime with `/config setup`.

cancelled.title: Cancelled
cancelled.description: Unregister cancelled. Your configuration remains active.

error.title: Error
error.description: Failed to unregister. Please try again.

setup.error_channel_required:
Please specify a channel for alerts.
Usage: `/config setup #channel`
setup.error_update_failed: Failed to update configuration. Please try again.
setup.error_registration_failed: Failed to complete registration. Please try again.

already_registered.title: Already Registered
already_registered.description_guild:
This server is already registered with %{channel}.

Use `/config show` to view settings or `/config unregister` to disable.
already_registered.description_user:
You're already registered for DM alerts.

Use `/config show` to view settings or `/config unregister` to disable.

channel_updated.title: Channel Updated
channel_updated.description: Alert channel has been changed to %{channel}.

success.title: Registration Complete!
success.description_guild:
VRCPulse alerts will be sent to %{channel}.

**Commands**
- `/config show` - View settings
- `/config unregister` - Disable alerts
- `/status` - Check VRChat status
success.description_user:
VRCPulse alerts will be sent to your DMs.

**Commands**
- `/config show` - View settings
- `/config unregister` - Disable alerts
- `/status` - Check VRChat status

setup.error_language_not_registered_guild:
This server isn't registered yet.
Run `/config setup #channel` first.
setup.error_language_not_registered_user:
You aren't registered yet.
Run `/config setup` first.
setup.error_language_update_failed: Failed to update language. Please try again.

errors.not_registered: This server/account isn't registered. Use `/config setup` to register first.
errors.no_permission: You don't have permission to unregister this server.
errors.could_not_verify: Could not verify your permissions. Please try again.
errors.only_own_account: You can only unregister your own account.
errors.invalid_button_state: Invalid button state. Please run `/config unregister` again.

success.title: Report Submitted
success.footer: Your report helps us detect widespread issues.
success.others_none: You're the first to report this issue recently.
success.others_one: 1 other user reported this issue in the last %{interval} minutes.
success.others_many: %{count} others reported this issue in the last %{interval} minutes.

cooldown.title: Report Cooldown
cooldown.description:
You recently submitted a report.
You can report again %{time}.

intro.title: Welcome to VRCPulse!
intro.description: VRCPulse monitors VRChat server status and alerts you when issues occur.
intro.field_getting_started_value:
1. Run `/config setup` to register for DM alerts
2. Check current VRChat status with `/status`
intro.field_commands_value:
- `/config setup` - Register for DM alerts
- `/config show` - View current settings
- `/status` - View VRChat status dashboard
intro.footer: Run /config setup to start receiving alerts and submit reports!

report.error_guild_not_registered: An administrator must run `/config setup #channel` first.
report.error_insert_failed: Failed to submit report. Please try again.

guild_join.title: Welcome to VRCPulse!
guild_join.description: VRCPulse monitors VRChat server status and alerts you when issues occur.
guild_join.field_getting_started_value:
1. Run `/config setup #channel` to register this server
2. Check current VRChat status with `/status`
guild_join.field_commands_value:
- `/config setup <channel>` - Register and set alert channel
- `/config show` - View current settings
- `/status` - View VRChat status dashboard
guild_join.footer: Thank you for adding VRCPulse to your server!

threshold.title: High Report Volume Detected
threshold.description: **%{count}** users reported **%{incident_type}** in the last %{interval} minutes.

errors.details_too_long:
Details must be under %{max} characters.
You provided %{current} characters.
errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
